atk-s0303a:14_6: Tadeva migagaṇassa abhayatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.

atk-s0303a:15_4: Vayoanuppattoti tesu tīsu addhesu pacchimavayaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0303a:15_6: Idañhi sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi niccapaggharaṇaṭṭhena āturaṃyeva nāma.
atk-s0303a:15_7: Visesena panassa jarāturatā byādhāturatā maraṇāturatāti tisso āturatā honti.

atk-s0303a:16_3: Yathā kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ vā mayūraṇḍaṃ vā geṇḍukaṃ viya gahetvā khipantena vā paharantena vā na sakkā kīḷituṃ,

atk-s0303a:24_0: “Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī”ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto,

atk-s0303a:25_17: Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto,

atk-s0303a:35_3: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato “saṃvaro” vinayanato “vinayo”ti vuccati.

atk-s0303a:37_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa,
atk-s0303a:37_3: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā

atk-s0303a:38_5: Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0303a:39_1: bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo bhinnasaṃvarattā pahātabbassa ca appahīnattā yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi,
atk-s0303a:39_3: Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthāpi.
atk-s0303a:40_14: ariyavinayeti vā sappurisavinayeti vā esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0303a:41_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati,
atk-s0303a:41_2: taṃ rūpa”nti rūpañca attañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a:41_3: Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci, so vaṇṇo. Yo vaṇṇo,
atk-s0303a:41_4: sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati,
atk-s0303a:41_6: advayaṃ samanupassatīti evaṃ rūpaṃ “attā”ti diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
atk-s0303a:41_7: Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya taṃ rūpavantaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a:41_8: Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a:41_9: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā karaṇḍake maṇiṃ viya taṃ attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a:41_12: mama rūpa”nti evaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gaṇhanako nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0303a:41_13: Tassa taṃ rūpanti tassa taṃ evaṃ gahitaṃ rūpaṃ.
atk-s0303a:42_0: Tattha “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:42_5: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:42_8: vedanāya vā attāna”nti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito.
atk-s0303a:42_9: Tattha “rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0303a:42_10: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā,
atk-s0303a:42_11: avasesesu sassatadiṭṭhīti evamettha pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti,
atk-s0303a:43_1: āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto cāti kāyo nāma buddhānampi āturoyeva.

atk-s0303a:45_5: Tassa avidūre nigamo devadahantveva napuṃsakaliṅgavasena saṅkhaṃ gato.

atk-s0303a:46_1: Anuggāhakoti āmisānuggahena ca dhammānuggahena cāti dvīhipi anuggahehi anuggāhako.
atk-s0303a:46_2: Thero kira aññe bhikkhū viya pātova piṇḍāya agantvā sabbabhikkhūsu gatesu sakalaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ anuvicaranto asammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjati,
atk-s0303a:46_6: “Mā aññatitthiyā vihāraṃ paviṭṭhā disvā paribhavaṃ akaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0303a:46_7: Tato gilānasālaṃ gantvā gilāne assāsetvā “kenattho”ti pucchitvā yena attho hoti,
atk-s0303a:46_8: tadatthaṃ tesaṃ daharasāmaṇere ādāya bhikkhācāravattena vā sabhāgaṭṭhāne vā bhesajjaṃ pariyesitvā tesaṃ datvā,
atk-s0303a:46_10: gacchatha sappurisā appamattā hothā”ti te pesetvā sayaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā upaṭṭhākakule vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0303a:47_0: Bhagavati pana cārikaṃ caramāne “ahaṃ aggasāvako”ti upāhanaṃ āruyha chattaṃ gahetvā purato purato na gacchati.
atk-s0303a:47_1: Ye pana tattha mahallakā vā ābādhikā vā atidaharā vā,
atk-s0303a:47_2: tesaṃ rujjanaṭṭhānāni telena makkhāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ attano daharasāmaṇerehi gāhāpetvā taṃdivasaṃ vā dutiyadivasaṃ vā te gaṇhitvāva gacchati.
atk-s0303a:47_3: Ekadivasañhi taññeva āyasmantaṃ ativikāle sampattattā senāsanaṃ alabhitvā,
atk-s0303a:47_9: Ovadanto panesa satavārampi sahassavārampi tāva ovadati,
atk-s0303a:47_12: Iminā nayena ovadato cassa ovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā.
atk-s0303a:48_7: Athettha catūhi pādehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā tassa upari taṃ gumbaṃ āropesuṃ,

atk-s0303a:49_0: Nānāverajjagatanti ekassa rañño rajjato nānāvidhaṃ rajjagataṃ.

atk-s0303a:52_4: Tassa kira pabbatassa ekaṃ passaṃ chinditvā pātitaṃ viya ahosi.

atk-s0303a:53_4: purejātañca kammaviññāṇaṃ pacchājātassa kammaviññāṇassapi vipākaviññāṇassapi vipākaviññāṇañca vipākaviññāṇassapi kammaviññāṇassapi paccayo hoti,

atk-s0303a:54_2: Cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayāti akusalacittassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtā ceva abhinivesabhūtā ca anusayabhūtā ca.
atk-s0303a:54_5: satthu pana khīṇāsavabhāvo loke atipākaṭoti uparimakoṭiyā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a:54_8: Kilesā hi na kevalaṃ catūsuyeva khandhesu pahīnā pahīyanti,
atk-s0303a:54_9: pañcasupi pahīyantiyevāti kilesappahānadassanatthaṃ gahitaṃ. Evaṃ kho, gahapati,
atk-s0303a:54_10: anokasārī hotīti evaṃ kammaviññāṇena okaṃ asarantena anokasārī nāma hoti.
atk-s0303a:55_3: Ubhayenapi hi kilesānaṃ patthaṭabhāvo ca vinibandhanabhāvo ca vutto,
atk-s0303a:55_5: tasmā rūpanimittaniketamhi uppannena kilesavisārena ceva kilesabandhanena cāti attho.
atk-s0303a:55_6: Niketasārīti vuccatīti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ sārīti vuccati.
atk-s0303a:56_3: Samānepi hi etesaṃ ālayaṭṭhena visayabhāve okoti niccanivāsanaṭṭhānagehameva vuccati,
atk-s0303a:56_4: niketanti “ajja asukaṭṭhāne kīḷissāmā”ti katasaṅketaṭṭhānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ uyyānādi.
atk-s0303a:56_5: Tattha yathā puttadāradhanadhaññapuṇṇagehe chandarāgo balavā hoti,
atk-s0303a:56_7: Yathā pana uyyānaṭṭhānādīsu tato dubbalataro hoti,
atk-s0303a:56_8: evaṃ bāhiresu chasu ārammaṇesūti chandarāgassa balavadubbalatāya evaṃ desanā katāti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a:57_0: Sukhitesu sukhitoti upaṭṭhākesu dhanadhaññalābhādivasena sukhitesu “idānāhaṃ manāpaṃ bhojanaṃ labhissāmī”ti gehasitasukhena sukhito hoti,
atk-s0303a:57_2: Dukkhitesu dukkhitoti tesaṃ kenacideva kāraṇena dukkhe uppanne sayaṃ dviguṇena dukkhena dukkhito hoti.
atk-s0303a:57_4: Tesu yogaṃ āpajjatīti upayogaṃ sayaṃ tesaṃ kiccānaṃ kattabbataṃ āpajjati.

atk-s0303a:300_13: Tasmiṃ gahite maggasaccaṃ gahitameva hoti tassa upāyattā.
atk-s0303a:302_2: Thero kira vutthavasso pavāretvā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgacchati.
atk-s0303a:302_12: Vattaṃ kiretaṃ bāḷhagilānenapi buḍḍhataraṃ disvā uṭṭhānākārena apaciti dassetabbā.
atk-s0303a:302_13: Tena pana “mā cali mā calī”ti vattabbo.
atk-s0303a:302_14: Santimāni āsanānīti buddhakālasmiñhi ekassapi bhikkhuno vasanaṭṭhāne “sace satthā āgacchissati,
atk-s0303a:302_15: idha nisīdissatī”ti āsanaṃ paññattameva hoti antamaso phalakamattampi paṇṇasanthāramattampi.
atk-s0303a:302_16: Khamanīyaṃ yāpanīyanti kacci dukkhaṃ khamituṃ iriyāpathaṃ vā yāpetuṃ sakkāti pucchati.
atk-s0303a:302_20: Sīlato na upavadatīti sīlaṃ ārabbha sīlabhāvena na upavadati.
atk-s0303a:302_23: Pūtikāyenāti attano suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi kāyaṃ bhagavā dhuvapaggharaṇaṭṭhena evamāha. Yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0303a:302_26: Navavidho hi lokuttaradhammo tathāgatassa kāyo nāma.
atk-s0303a:303_0: Idāni therassa tiparivaṭṭadhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:303_3: Suvimutto vimuccissatīti arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimutto hutvā vimuccissati.
atk-s0303a:303_4: Tā kira devatā “yena nīhārena iminā vipassanā āraddhā,
atk-s0303a:303_7: Satthaṃ āharesīti thero kira adhimāniko ahosi.
atk-s0303a:303_8: So samādhivipassanāhi vikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ samudācāraṃ apassanto “khīṇāsavomhī”ti saññī hutvā “kiṃ me iminā dukkhena jīvitena?
atk-s0303a:303_9: Satthaṃ āharitvā marissāmī”ti tikhiṇena satthena kaṇṭhanāḷaṃ chindi.
atk-s0303a:303_11: So tasmiṃ khaṇe attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānattā sīghaṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ ādāya sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvāva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0303a:303_13: Khīṇāsavassa ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇā na sabbāva avassaṃ laddhabbā,
atk-s0303a:303_14: tikhiṇenāpi pana asinā sīse chijjante ekaṃ dve ñāṇāni avassaṃ uppajjanti.
atk-s0303a:304_2: Thero kira uttānako nipanno satthaṃ āhari.
atk-s0303a:304_5: Ariyasāvakā hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapasseneva kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0303a:304_8: Taṃ sandhāya vivattakkhandho nāma jātotipi vadanti.
atk-s0303a:304_11: Dhūmavalāhakaṃ viya timiravalāhakaṃ viya cāti attho. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:306_3: So hi te catutthajjhānena passambhitvā passambhitvā vihāsi.
atk-s0303a:306_4: Evaṃ hotīti idāni taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhantassa evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0303a:306_5: No cassāhaṃ parihāyāmīti kacci nu kho ahaṃ sāsanato na parihāyāmi?
atk-s0303a:306_6: Tassa kira ābādhadosena appitappitā samāpatti parihāyi,
atk-s0303a:306_8: Samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññāti samādhiṃyeva sārañca sāmaññañca maññanti.
atk-s0303a:306_9: Mayhaṃ pana sāsane na etaṃ sāraṃ,
atk-s0303a:306_11: So tvaṃ samādhito parihāyanto kasmā cintesi “sāsanato parihāyāmī”ti.
atk-s0303a:306_12: Evaṃ theraṃ assāsetvā idānissa tiparivaṭṭaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:306_13: Athassa tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasāne arahattaṃ pattassa satatavihāraṃ dassento so sukhaṃ ce vedanaṃ vedayatītiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:306_14: Tattha anabhinanditāti pajānātīti sukhavedanāya tāva abhinandanā hotu,
atk-s0303a:306_19: Sukhavipariṇāmena hi dukkhaṃ āgatameva hotīti evaṃ dukkhe abhinandanā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a:308_2: Asmīti adhigatanti asmīti evaṃ pavattā taṇhāmānā adhigatā.
atk-s0303a:308_5: Dāsakatthero pana catukkhattuṃ gamanāgamanena taṃdivasaṃ dviyojanaṃ addhānaṃ āhiṇḍi.
atk-s0303a:308_10: tattha saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā okāso natthīti na gatā.
atk-s0303a:308_11: “Idhāgantvā amhākaṃ dhammaṃ kathetū”tipi kasmā pana na pahiṇiṃsūti?
atk-s0303a:309_1: rūpanti yo hi rūpameva asmīti vadati,
atk-s0303a:309_2: tena itare cattāro khandhā paccakkhātā honti.
atk-s0303a:309_6: Therassa pana samūhato pañcasupi khandhesu asmīti adhigato,
atk-s0303a:310_3: tīhi khārehi dhotavatthaṃ viya desanāya madditvā ṭhito anāgāmino cittācāro,
atk-s0303a:310_5: gandhakaraṇḍako viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ gandhakaraṇḍakaṃ āgamma anusahagatānaṃ ūsagandhādīnaṃ samugghāto viya arahattamaggena sabbakilesakkhayo,
atk-s0303a:310_6: gandhaparibhāvitavatthaṃ nivāsetvā chaṇadivase antaravīthiyaṃ sugandhagandhino vicaraṇaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0303a:311_7: Saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānanti te kira therena kathitakathitaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā uparūpari sammasantā desanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0303a:311_8: Theropi aññena nīhārena akathetvā vipassanāsahagatacitteneva kathesi.
atk-s0303a:311_11: “saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu āyasmato khemakassa cā”ti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:313_1: Aṭṭhame āyasmā channoti tathāgatena saddhiṃ ekadivase jāto mahābhinikkhamanadivase saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0303a:313_2: puna aparabhāge satthu santike pabbajitvā “amhākaṃ buddho amhākaṃ dhammo”ti evaṃ makkhī ceva paḷāsī ca
atk-s0303a:313_3: hutvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ pharusavācāya saṅghaṭṭanaṃ karonto thero.
atk-s0303a:313_5: Vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā tato aññaṃ,
atk-s0303a:313_6: tato aññanti evaṃ tena tena vihārena taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā.
atk-s0303a:313_7: Etadavoca ovadantu manti kasmā evaṃ mahantena ussāhena tattha tattha gantvā etaṃ avocāti?
atk-s0303a:313_9: Tassa hi parinibbute satthari dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi pesito āyasmā ānando kosambiṃ gantvā brahmadaṇḍaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0303a:313_10: So dinne brahmadaṇḍe sañjātapariḷāho visaññībhūto patitvā puna saññaṃ labhitvā vuṭṭhāya ekassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gato,
atk-s0303a:313_11: so tena saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi.
atk-s0303a:313_13: sopi na kathesīti evaṃ sakalavihāraṃ vicaritvā nibbinno pattacīvaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uppannasaṃvego tattha tattha gantvā evaṃ avoca.
atk-s0303a:314_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā aniccā.
atk-s0303a:314_1: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbe catubhūmakadhammā anattā.
atk-s0303a:314_2: Iti sabbepi te bhikkhū theraṃ ovadantā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ anattalakkhaṇanti dveva lakkhaṇāni kathetvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na kathayiṃsu. Kasmā?
atk-s0303a:314_4: “ayaṃ bhikkhu vādī dukkhalakkhaṇe paññāpiyamāne rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe…
atk-s0303a:314_7: phalaṃ dukkhanti ‘tumhe dukkhappattā bhikkhū nāmā’ti gahaṇaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0303a:314_9: evaṃ niddosamevassa katvā kathessāmā”ti dveva lakkhaṇāni kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0303a:315_0: Paritassanā upādānaṃ uppajjatīti paritassanā ca upādānañca uppajjati.
atk-s0303a:315_2: atha ko carahi me attāti yadi rūpādīsu ekopi anattā,
atk-s0303a:315_3: atha ko nāma me attāti evaṃ paṭinivattati “mayhaṃ mānasa”nti.
atk-s0303a:315_4: Ayaṃ kira thero paccaye apariggahetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0303a:315_5: sāssa dubbalavipassanā attagāhaṃ pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇantī saṅkhāresu suññato upaṭṭhahantesu “ucchijjissāmi
atk-s0303a:315_6: vinassissāmī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiyā ceva paritassanāya ca paccayo ahosi.
atk-s0303a:315_7: So ca attānaṃ pāpate papatantaṃ viya disvā,
atk-s0303a:315_10: atha ko carahi me attā”ti āha.
atk-s0303a:315_11: Na kho panevaṃ dhammaṃ passato hotīti catusaccadhammaṃ passantassa evaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0303a:315_13: Sammukhā metanti thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0303a:315_15: Cintento tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vicinitvā kaccānasuttaṃ addasa “idaṃ āditova diṭṭhiviniveṭhanaṃ katvā
atk-s0303a:315_16: majjhe buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā saṇhasukhumapaccayākāraṃ pakāsayamānaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0303a:317_2: Kevalaṃ hetāni ayaṃ theravaggoti katvā idhāgatānīti.
atk-s0303a:321_7: Te naṃ ajjholambeyyunti te tīre jātāpi onamitvā aggehi udakaṃ phusantehi adhiolambeyyuṃ,
atk-s0303a:321_10: So tehi ajjhotthaṭo vālukamattikodakehi mukhaṃ pavisantehi mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0303a:322_0: Evameva khoti ettha sote patitapuriso viya vaṭṭasannissito bālaputhujjano daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0303a:322_2: “ime gahitāpi maṃ tāretuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti tassa purisassa ajānitvā gahaṇaṃ viya ime khandhā “na mayhaṃ
atk-s0303a:322_3: sahāyā”ti bālaputhujjanassa ajānitvā catūhi gāhehi gahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0303a:322_4: gahitagahitānaṃ palujjanattā purisassa byasanappatti viya catūhi gāhehi gahitānaṃ khandhānaṃ vipariṇāme
atk-s0303a:324_1: Dutiye vivadatīti “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubha”nti yathāsabhāvena vadantena saddhiṃ “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti vadanto vivadati.
atk-s0303a:324_12: “tathāgato loke jāto loke saṃvaḍḍho”ti ettha okāsaloko kathito. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0303a:326_1: Tatiye gaṅgāya nadiyā tīreti ayujjhapuravāsino aparimāṇabhikkhuparivāraṃ cārikaṃ caramānaṃ tathāgataṃ
atk-s0303a:326_2: attano nagaraṃ sampattaṃ disvā ekasmiṃ gaṅgāya nivattanaṭṭhāne mahāvanasaṇḍamaṇḍitappadese satthu vihāraṃ
atk-s0303a:326_6: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti tasmiṃ vihāre vasanto bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā
atk-s0303a:326_7: gaṅgātīre paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno gaṅgāya nadiyā āgacchantaṃ mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ disvā,
atk-s0303a:326_8: “mama sāsane pañcakkhandhanissitaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī”ti cintetvā parivāretvā nisinne bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0303a:327_0: Mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍanti uṭṭhānuṭṭhāne badarapakkappamāṇato paṭṭhāya anusotāgamanena anupubbena pavaḍḍhitvā pabbatakūṭamattaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0303a:327_7: antarā pana abhijjantopi mahāsamuddaṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati.
atk-s0303a:328_2: Yathā ca so “iminā pattaṃ vā thālakaṃ vā karissāmī”ti gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a:328_5: evaṃ rūpampi niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a:328_7: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubhaññeva hotīti evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍasadisameva hoti.
atk-s0303a:328_8: Yathā vā pana pheṇapiṇḍo chiddāvachiddo anekasandhighaṭito bahūnaṃ udakasappādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ āvāso,
atk-s0303a:328_11: tadeva tesaṃ sūtigharampi vaccakuṭipi gilānasālāpi susānampi,
atk-s0303a:328_12: na te aññattha gantvā gabbhavuṭṭhānādīni karonti,
atk-s0303a:329_0: Yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo ādito badarapakkamatto hutvā anupubbena pabbatakūṭamattopi hoti,
atk-s0303a:329_1: evaṃ rūpampi ādito kalalamattaṃ hutvā anupubbena byāmamattampi gomahiṃsahatthiādīnaṃ vasena pabbatakūṭādimattaṃ
atk-s0303a:329_9: antarā pana abhijjamānampi vassasatāyukānaṃ vassasataṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati,
atk-s0303a:330_2: vedanāya sārotiādīsu vedanādīnaṃ pubbuḷādīhi evaṃ sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a:330_3: Yathā hi pubbuḷo asāro evaṃ vedanāpi.
atk-s0303a:330_5: na sakkā taṃ gahetvā phalakaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā kātuṃ,
atk-s0303a:330_8: na sakkā niccāti vā dhuvāti vā gahetuṃ,
atk-s0303a:330_11: Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udakabindumhi pubbuḷo uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca,
atk-s0303a:330_13: evaṃ vedanāpi uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca,
atk-s0303a:330_19: saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati,
atk-s0303a:330_20: evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ kilesajallaṃ phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-s0303a:331_2: Na hi sakkā taṃ gahetvā pivituṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ.
atk-s0303a:331_5: evaṃ nīlasaññādibhedā saññāpi nīlādianubhavanatthāya phandati vipphandati.
atk-s0303a:331_6: Yathā ca marīci mahājanaṃ vippalambheti “puṇṇavāpi viya puṇṇanadī viya dissatī”ti vadāpeti,
atk-s0303a:332_3: Yatheva hi kadalikkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasiādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ,
atk-s0303a:332_5: evaṃ saṅkhārāpi na sakkā niccādivasena gahetuṃ,
atk-s0303a:332_14: samodhānetvā pana saṅkhārakkhandhova vuccatīti evampi saṅkhārakkhandho kadalikkhandhasadiso.
atk-s0303a:333_0: Cakkhumā purisoti maṃsacakkhunā ceva paññācakkhunā cāti dvīhi cakkhūhi cakkhumā.
atk-s0303a:333_8: Teneva hi cittena puriso āgato viya gato viya ṭhito viya nisinno viya hoti.
atk-s0303a:333_15: Teneva hi cittena āgacchantaṃ viya gacchantaṃ viya ṭhitaṃ viya nisinnaṃ viya katvā gāhāpeti.
atk-s0303a:334_4: Etādisāyaṃ santānoti etādisī ayaṃ paveṇī matakassa yāva susānā ghaṭṭīyatīti.
atk-s0303a:334_7: Vadhakoti dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ khandhasaṅkhāto vadhako aññamaññaghātanenapi,
atk-s0303a:334_9: Ekā hi pathavīdhātu bhijjamānā sesadhātuyo gahetvāva bhijjati,
atk-s0303a:334_11: Rūpakkhandho ca bhijjamāno arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati,
atk-s0303a:334_13: Cattāropi cete vatthurūpanti evaṃ aññamaññavadhanenettha vadhakatā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a:334_15: evaṃ etesu sati vadhabhāvatopi vadhakatā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a:336_5: Atthassa pana viññāpanatthaṃ iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā hatthāruḷhaṃ katanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0303a:336_7: Na yidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyethāti ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyavāso nāma na paññāyeyya.
atk-s0303a:336_9: Yadi ca ettako attabhāvo nicco bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a:336_10: maggo uppajjitvāpi saṅkhāravaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti brahmacariyavāso na paññāyetha.
atk-s0303a:337_0: Idāni sace koci saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a:337_1: mayā mahāsudassanarājakāle anubhūtā sampatti niccā bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a:337_2: sāpi ca aniccāti taṃ dassetuṃ bhūtapubbāhaṃ bhikkhu rājā ahosintiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:337_3: Tattha kusāvatīrājadhānippamukhānīti kusāvatīrājadhānī tesaṃ nagarānaṃ pamukhā,
atk-s0303a:337_12: Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbetvā karonti.
atk-s0303a:337_16: Vejayantarathappamukhānīti ettha vejayanto nāma tassa rañño ratho,
atk-s0303a:337_26: Vatthakoṭisahassānīti yathārucitaṃ paribhuñjissatīti nhatvā ṭhitakāle upanītavatthāneva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a:338_0: Yamahaṃ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmīti yattha vasāmi,
atk-s0303a:338_2: avasesesu puttadhītādayo ceva dāsamanussā ca vasiṃsu.
atk-s0303a:338_11: sesāni parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ asītisahassādhikānaṃ soḷasannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hontīti dasseti.
atk-s0303a:338_13: sesaṃ parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ cattālīsasahassādhikānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0303a:339_0: Iti imaṃ mahāsudassanakāle sampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tassā aniccataṃ dassento iti kho bhikkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:339_1: Tattha vipariṇatāti pakatijahanena nibbutapadīpo viya apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatā.
atk-s0303a:339_2: Evaṃ aniccā kho bhikkhu saṅkhārāti evaṃ hutvāabhāvaṭṭhena aniccā.
atk-s0303a:339_3: Ettāvatā bhagavā yathā nāma puriso satahatthubbedhe campakarukkhe nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā abhiruhitvā campakapupphaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto otareyya,
atk-s0303a:339_4: evamevaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhanto viya anekavassakoṭisatasahassubbedhaṃ mahāsudassanasampattiṃ āruyha sampattimatthake
atk-s0303a:339_5: ṭhitaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto viya otiṇṇo.
atk-s0303a:339_6: Evaṃ addhuvāti evaṃ udakapubbuḷādayo viya dhuvabhāvarahitā.
atk-s0303a:339_7: Evaṃ anassāsikāti evaṃ supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ viya ca assāsavirahitā.
atk-s0303a:341_1: Sattame yaṃ mahāsamuddoti yasmiṃ samaye pañcame sūriye uṭṭhite mahāsamuddo ussussati.
atk-s0303a:341_2: Dukkhassa antakiriyanti cattāri saccāni appaṭivijjhitvā avijjāya nivutānaṃyeva sataṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyaṃ paricchedaṃ na vadāmi.
atk-s0303a:341_6: Evameva khoti ettha sunakho viya vaṭṭanissito bālo,
atk-s0303a:341_9: gaddularajjuyā thambhe upanibaddhasunakhassa thambhānuparivattanaṃ viya diṭṭhitaṇhāya sakkāye baddhassa
atk-s0303a:343_1: Aṭṭhame tasmāti yasmā diṭṭhigaddulanissitāya taṇhārajjuyā sakkāyathambhe upanibaddho vaṭṭanissito bālaputhujjano
atk-s0303a:343_3: yasmā vā dīgharattamidaṃ cittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ rāgena dosena mohena, tasmā.
atk-s0303a:343_4: Cittasaṃkilesāti sunhātāpi hi sattā cittasaṃkileseneva saṃkilissanti,
atk-s0303a:347_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti.
atk-s0303a:348_2: te paṭakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā tattha nānappakārā sugatiduggativasena sampattivipattiyo lekhāpetvā,
atk-s0303a:348_4: idaṃ katvā ida”nti dassentā taṃ cittaṃ gahetvā vicaranti.
atk-s0303a:348_5: Citteneva cittitanti cittakārena cintetvā katattā cittena cintitaṃ nāma.
atk-s0303a:348_6: Cittaññeva cittataranti tassa cittassa upāyapariyesanacittaṃ tatopi cittataraṃ.
atk-s0303a:348_7: Tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittitāti kammacitteneva cittitā.
atk-s0303a:348_8: Taṃ pana kammacittaṃ ime vaṭṭakatittirādayo “evaṃ cittā bhavissāmā”ti āyūhantā nāma natthi.
atk-s0303a:348_11: Yoniupagatā hi sattā taṃtaṃyonikehi sadisacittāva honti.
atk-s0303a:349_0: Apica cittaṃ nāmetaṃ sahajātaṃ sahajātadhammacittatāya bhūmicittatāya vatthucittatāya dvāracittatāya
atk-s0303a:350_1: So pana acheko amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ karoti,
atk-s0303a:350_3: evameva puthujjano akusalacittena vā ñāṇavippayuttakusalena vā cakkhusampadādivirahitaṃ virūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0303a:352_3: kukkuṭiyā aṇḍānīti imā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena dve upamā vuttā.
atk-s0303a:352_11: Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti,
atk-s0303a:352_16: Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya ca janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni.
atk-s0303a:352_17: Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni usmīkatāni.
atk-s0303a:352_18: Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni,
atk-s0303a:352_20: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyāti tassā kukkuṭiyā iminā tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā upajjeyya.
atk-s0303a:352_21: Atha kho bhabbāva teti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā vuttanayena sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva.
atk-s0303a:352_22: Te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni honti,
atk-s0303a:352_28: kapālassa tanuttā bahi āloko anto paññāyati,
atk-s0303a:352_29: tasmā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimhā,
atk-s0303a:352_31: ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti,
atk-s0303a:352_34: Atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamantiyeva,
atk-s0303a:353_2: tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno bhāvānuyogaṃ anuyuttakālo,
atk-s0303a:353_3: kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0303a:353_5: tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ,
atk-s0303a:353_6: aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya tassa bhikkhuno avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo,
atk-s0303a:353_7: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhamukhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasanna sūrabhāvo,
atk-s0303a:353_8: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇāmakālo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhitakālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo,
atk-s0303a:353_9: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0303a:353_10: abhinibbhidākālo viya tassa bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ
atk-s0303a:353_11: vā bhojanasappāyaṃ vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0303a:353_12: vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0303a:353_14: Yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0303a:353_15: evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi –
atk-s0303a:356_0: Ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati.
atk-s0303a:356_1: So gāthāpariyosāne avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0303a:356_2: Tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha vicaranti,
atk-s0303a:356_3: evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā saṅghārāmaṃ upasobhayamāno vicarati.
atk-s0303a:357_1: So hi olambakasaṅkhātaṃ palaṃ dhāretvā dārūnaṃ gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti vuccati.
atk-s0303a:357_3: Ettakaṃ vata me ajja āsavānaṃ khīṇanti pabbajitassa hi pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesena paripucchāya yoniso
atk-s0303a:357_4: manasikārena vattapaṭipattiyā ca niccakālaṃ āsavā khīyanti.
atk-s0303a:357_5: Evaṃ khīyamānānaṃ pana tesaṃ “ettakaṃ ajja khīṇaṃ,
atk-s0303a:357_6: ettakaṃ hiyyo”ti evamassa ñāṇaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0303a:358_0: Evameva khoti ettha mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0303a:358_2: nāvāya mahāsamudde pariyādānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno ūnapañcavassakāle ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vicaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0303a:358_3: nāvāya mahāsamuddodakena khajjamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bhikkhuno pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesaparipucchādīhi ceva saṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo,
atk-s0303a:358_4: nāvāya thale ukkhittakālo viya bhikkhuno nissayamuccakassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanakālo,
atk-s0303a:358_5: divā vātātapena saṃsussanaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇena taṇhāsnehasaṃsussanaṃ,
atk-s0303a:358_6: rattiṃ himodakena temanaṃ viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya uppannena pītipāmojjena cittatemanaṃ,
atk-s0303a:358_7: rattindivaṃ vātātapena ceva himodakena ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0303a:358_8: utusappāyādīni laddhā vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya dubbalabhāvo,
atk-s0303a:358_10: meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya bandhe pūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa
atk-s0303a:358_11: okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa arahattaphalādhigamo,
atk-s0303a:358_12: pūtibandhanāvāya kañci kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0303a:358_13: pūtibandhanāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa upādiṇṇakkhandhabhedena
atk-s0303a:358_14: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoti imāya upamāya saṃyojanānaṃ dubbalatā dīpitā. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:360_1: Dasame aniccasaññāti aniccaṃ aniccanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0303a:360_7: yathā kassako kasanto naṅgalena tāni padāleti,
atk-s0303a:360_8: evaṃ yogī aniccasaññaṃ bhāvento aniccasaññāñāṇena kilese padāletīti idamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ.
atk-s0303a:361_4: lāyanaṃ nicchoṭanaṃ viya aniccasaññāñāṇanti iminā atthena upamā saṃsandetabbā.
atk-s0303a:362_5: yathā khurappena chinnāya ambapiṇḍiyā sabbāni ambāni bhūmiyaṃ patanti,
atk-s0303a:362_6: evaṃ aniccasaññāñāṇena kilesānaṃ mūlabhūtāya avijjāya chinnāya sabbakilesā samugghātaṃ gacchantīti,
atk-s0303a:363_11: Iminā upāyena sabbāsu upamāsu opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a:368_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ catusaccavasena pañcakkhandhe yojetvā antoti vacanena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:370_1: Dutiyampi pañcakkhandhe catusaccavasena yojetvā dukkhanti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:370_2: Tatiyampi tatheva sakkāyoti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:372_3: Pariññātāvinti tāya pariññāya parijānitvā samatikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:374_0: 107-112. Pañcamādīsu catūsu cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Navamadasamesu kilesappahānanti. Pañcamādīni.
atk-s0303a:378_1: Dhammakathikavaggassa paṭhame ettāvatā ca avijjāgato hotīti yāvatā imāya catūsu saccesu aññāṇabhūtāya avijjāya samannāgato,
atk-s0303a:380_3: tatiyena asekhabhūmīti evaṃ dhammakathikaṃ pucchitena visesetvā dve bhūmiyo kathitā. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0303a:382_0: 116. Catutthe tissannampi pucchānaṃ tīṇi vissajjanāni kathitāni. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0303a:384_5: Baddhoti kilesabandhanena baddho hutvā jīyati ca mīyati ca asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0303a:386_5: tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇḍānaṃ paccayabhāvena vā khaṇanaṭṭhena vā sallato dukkhaṭṭhena aghato,
atk-s0303a:394_0: 126-135. Avijjāvaggo uttānatthova. Imasmiñhi vagge sabbasuttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:398_1: Kukkuḷavaggassa paṭhame kukkuḷanti santattaṃ ādittaṃ chārikarāsiṃ viya mahāpariḷāhaṃ.
atk-s0303a:402_1: Diṭṭhivaggassa paṭhame kiṃ upādāyāti kiṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0303a:404_1: Dasame upasaṅkamīti aññe bhikkhū pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjitvā ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0303a:404_2: satthu santike aññaṃ byākaronte disvā “ahampi pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjanto ghaṭento,
atk-s0303a:404_3: arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākarissāmī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0303a:404_4: Satthā pana attano dharamānakāle therassa uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ apassantopi “imassa cittaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kathesi.
atk-s0303a:404_5: Tassāpi ekaṃ dve vāre manasi katvāva buddhupaṭṭhānavelā jātāti gantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0303a:404_6: Itissa cittaṃ sampahaṃsamāno vimuttiparipācanīyadhammova so kammaṭṭhānānuyogo jātoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:413_1: Rādhasaṃyuttassa paṭhame māro vā assāti maraṇaṃ vā bhaveyya.
atk-s0303a:413_3: Yo vā pana mīyatīti yo vā pana marati.
atk-s0303a:415_2: Tatra satto tatra visattoti tatra laggo tatra vilaggo.
atk-s0303a:415_9: Vikīḷaniyaṃ karontīti “niṭṭhitā kīḷā”ti te bhindamānā kīḷāvigamaṃ karonti.
atk-s0303a:419_3: Yasmā pana rūpādivinimuttaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0303a:423_3: Tathāgatassa imaṃ theraṃ disvā sukhumaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0303a:423_5: Evaṃ imasmiṃ rādhasaṃyutte ādito dve vaggā pucchāvasena desitā,
atk-s0303a:423_8: Sakalampi panetaṃ rādhasaṃyuttaṃ therassa vimuttiparipācanīyadhammavaseneva gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a:430_1: Diṭṭhisaṃyutte na vātā vāyantītiādīsu evaṃ kira tesaṃ diṭṭhi –
atk-s0303a:430_5: vāto pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito.
atk-s0303a:430_6: Tathā yāpi etā tiṇakaṭṭhādīni vahantiyo nadiyo sandanti,
atk-s0303a:430_9: udakaṃ pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:430_14: gabbho pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito.
atk-s0303a:430_15: Yepi ete candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā,
atk-s0303a:430_18: candimasūriyā pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0303a:432_4: Tañhi patvā gahetabbato mutanti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a:432_6: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0303a:432_7: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā apattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:432_15: Apariyesitvā pattañca apariyesitvā nopattañca manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma.
atk-s0303a:432_16: Atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma,
atk-s0303a:434_1: Natthi dinnantiādīsu natthi dinnanti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0303a:434_7: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati,
atk-s0303a:434_9: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi.
atk-s0303a:434_10: Natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassapi paro loko natthi,
atk-s0303a:434_12: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadanti.
atk-s0303a:434_13: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a:434_14: Natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇāti loke sammāpaṭipannā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a:435_1: Pathavī pathavīkāyanti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ.
atk-s0303a:435_11: cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho.
atk-s0303a:435_22: na tato paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0303a:437_7: Socato socāpayatoti parassa bhaṇḍaharaṇādīhi sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassāpi parehi kārentassāpi.
atk-s0303a:437_8: Kilamato kilamāpayatoti āhārupacchedabandhanāgārapavesanādīhi sayaṃ kilamentassapi parehi kilamāpentassapi.
atk-s0303a:437_9: Phandato phandāpayatoti paraṃ phandantaṃ phandanakāle sayampi phandato parempi phandāpayato.
atk-s0303a:438_3: Paripanthe tiṭṭhatoti āgatāgatānaṃ acchindanatthaṃ magge tiṭṭhato.
atk-s0303a:438_4: Karoto na karīyati pāpanti yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ karomīti saññāya karotopi pāpaṃ na karīyati,
atk-s0303a:438_6: Sattā pana karomāti evaṃsaññino hontīti dīpenti.
atk-s0303a:439_2: Uttaranti uttaratīre saddhā honti pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
atk-s0303a:441_1: Natthi hetu natthi paccayoti ettha paccayoti hetuvevacanameva.
atk-s0303a:441_4: Natthi balanti yamhi attano bale patiṭṭhitā ime sattā devattampi mārattampi brahmattampi sāvakabodhimpi paccekabodhimpi sabbaññutampi pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0303a:442_3: Sabbe bhūtāti aṇḍakosavatthikosesu bhūte sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0303a:442_6: Avasā abalā avīriyāti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0303a:442_8: Saṅgatīti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a:442_10: Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā.
atk-s0303a:442_15: Chasvevābhijātīsūti chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti,
atk-s0303a:444_3: “evaṃ karohī”ti kenaci kāritāpi na hontīti attho.
atk-s0303a:444_8: Vañjhāti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā kassaci ajanakā.
atk-s0303a:444_13: Na iñjantīti esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā na calanti.
atk-s0303a:444_15: Na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti aññamaññaṃ na upahananti.
atk-s0303a:444_19: Sattannaṃtveva kāyānanti yathā muggarāsiādīsu pahaṭaṃ satthaṃ muggarāsiādīnaṃ antareneva pavisati,
atk-s0303a:444_20: evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0303a:444_21: Tattha “ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī”ti kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hotīti dassenti.
atk-s0303a:445_0: Yonipamukhasatasahassānīti pamukhayonīnaṃ uttamayonīnaṃ cuddasasatasahassāni aññāni ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni
atk-s0303a:445_1: ca chasatāni pañca ca kammuno satānīti pañcakammasatāni cāti kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakadiṭṭhiṃ dīpenti.
atk-s0303a:445_2: Pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0303a:445_5: Kamme ca aḍḍhakamme cāti ettha panassa kāyakammavacīkammāni kammanti laddhi,
atk-s0303a:445_8: Dvaṭṭhantarakappāti ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti,
atk-s0303a:445_9: ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha.
atk-s0303a:446_0: Chaḷābhijātiyoti kaṇhābhijāti nīlābhijāti lohitābhijāti haliddābhijāti sukkābhijāti paramasukkābhijātīti imā cha abhijātiyo vadanti.
atk-s0303a:446_1: Tattha orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā māgavikā luddā macchaghātakā corā coraghātakā bandhanāgārikā,
atk-s0303a:446_5: Te kira catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti,
atk-s0303a:446_6: “bhikkhū ca kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti ayaṃ hissa pāḷi eva.
atk-s0303a:446_7: Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke pabbajitāti vadanti.
atk-s0303a:446_11: Evaṃ attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karonti.
atk-s0303a:447_0: Aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti mandabhūmi khiḍḍābhūmi vīmaṃsakabhūmi ujugatabhūmi sekhabhūmi samaṇabhūmi jānanabhūmi
atk-s0303a:447_2: Tattha jātadivasato paṭṭhāya satta divase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā,
atk-s0303a:447_5: te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti ca,
atk-s0303a:447_6: sugatito āgatā taṃ anussaritvā anussaritvā hasanti,
atk-s0303a:447_8: Mātāpitūnaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ vīmaṃsakabhūmi nāma.
atk-s0303a:447_13: “Bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhā”ti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a:449_6: Ettha ekamhā mahāsarā vassasate vassasate kusaggena ekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharitvā sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake kate eko mahākappoti vadati.
atk-s0303a:449_7: Evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni khepetvā bāle ca paṇḍite ca dukkhassantaṃ karontīti ayamassa laddhi.
atk-s0303a:450_0: Sīlena vāti acelakasīlena vā aññena vā yena kenaci.
atk-s0303a:450_3: Aparipakkaṃ paripāceti nāma yo “ahaṃ paṇḍito”ti antarā visujjhati.
atk-s0303a:450_4: Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa byantīkaroti nāma yo “ahaṃ bālo”ti vuttaparimāṇakālaṃ atikkamitvā yāti.
atk-s0303a:450_6: Tañhi ubhayampi na sakkā kātunti dīpeti.
atk-s0303a:450_15: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento seyyathāpi nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:450_17: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā khittaṃ suttappamāṇena nibbeṭhiyamānameva gacchati,
atk-s0303a:450_19: na gacchati evameva bālā ca paṇḍitā ca kālavasena nibbeṭhiyamānā sukhadukkhaṃ palenti,
atk-s0303a:452_1: Antavā lokoti ekato vaḍḍhitanimittaṃ lokoti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a:452_2: Anantavāti sabbato vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇanimittaṃ lokoti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a:452_3: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti jīvañca sarīrañca ekamevāti uppannadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a:452_5: Imāni tāva sotāpattimaggavasena aṭṭhārasa veyyākaraṇāni ekaṃ gamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a:454_3: tato parāni “rūpī attā hotī”tiādīni aṭṭha veyyākaraṇāni,
atk-s0303a:455_2: Rūpī ca arūpī cāti ārammaṇañca jhānañca “attā”ti gahitadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a:455_5: Jhānalābhinopi hi atīte ekantasukhaṃ attabhāvaṃ manasikaroto evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati.
atk-s0303a:455_8: Jātissarassapi sattaṭṭhabhave sukhitabhāvaṃ passantassa evaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0303a:456_0: Tatiyapeyyālo aniccadukkhavasena tehiyeva chabbīsatiyā suttehi vutto,
atk-s0303a:462_3: Abhabbo ca tāva kālaṃ kātunti iminā uppanne magge phalassa anantarāyataṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0303a:462_4: Uppannasmiñhi magge phalassa antarāyakaraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0303a:462_11: Mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamantīti pamāṇato olokanaṃ khamanti.
atk-s0303a:472_6: So hi tassa uppajjituṃ appadānena upakkilesoti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a:472_9: Abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesūti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena abhijānitvā sacchikātabbesu chaḷabhiññādhammesu,
atk-s0303a:472_10: ekaṃ dhammaṃ vā gaṇhantena nekkhammanti gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a:478_1: Sāriputtasaṃyuttassa paṭhame na evaṃ hotīti ahaṅkāramamaṅkārānaṃ pahīnattā evaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0303a:480_2: Upasaṅkamīti theraṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ samantapāsādikaṃ disvā “iminā saddhiṃ parihāsaṃ karissāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0303a:480_3: Atha therena tasmiṃ vacane paṭikkhitte “idānissa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti maññamānā tena hi, samaṇa,
atk-s0303a:481_5: Micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentīti teneva vatthuvijjātiracchānavijjāsaṅkhātena micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappenti,
atk-s0303a:481_6: tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ sampādanena pasannehi manussehi dinne paccaye paribhuñjantā jīvantīti attho.
atk-s0303a:481_7: Adhomukhāti vatthuṃ oloketvā bhuñjamānavasena adhomukhā bhuñjanti nāma.
atk-s0303a:481_9: Api cettha nakkhattavijjāti “ajja imaṃ nakkhattaṃ iminā nakkhattena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0303a:481_12: tesaṃ tesaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a:481_13: Pahiṇagamananti ekagāmasmiṃyeva ekakulassa sāsanena aññakulaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a:481_14: Aṅgavijjāti itthilakkhaṇapurisalakkhaṇavasena aṅgasampattiṃ ñatvā “tāya aṅgasampattiyā idaṃ nāma labbhatī”ti evaṃ jānanavijjā.
atk-s0303a:481_15: Vidisāmukhāti aṅgavijjā hi taṃ taṃ sarīrakoṭṭhāsaṃ ārabbha pavattattā vidisāya pavattā nāma,
atk-s0303a:481_16: tasmā tāya vijjāya jīvikaṃ kappetvā bhuñjantā vidisāmukhā bhuñjanti nāma.
atk-s0303a:481_17: Evamārocesīti “dhammikaṃ samaṇā”tiādīni vadamānā sāsanassa niyyānikaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0303a:481_18: Tañca paribbājikāya kathaṃ sutvā pañcamattāni kulasatāni sāsane otariṃsūti.
atk-s0303a:487_6: Bhikkhūnañhi “kati nu kho nāgayoniyo”ti kathā udapādi.
atk-s0303a:487_7: Atha bhagavā puggalānaṃ nāgayonīhi uddharaṇatthaṃ nāgayoniyo āvikaronto imaṃ suttamāha.
atk-s0303a:489_11: Yānanti chattupāhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā yaṃkiñci gamanapaccayaṃ.
atk-s0303a:489_15: Seyyāvasathapadīpeyyanti mañcapīṭhādiseyyaṃ ekabhūmikādiāvasathaṃ vaṭṭitelādipadīpūpakaraṇañca detīti attho.
atk-s0303a:489_16: Tesañhi dīghāyukatāya ca vaṇṇavantatāya ca sukhabahulatāya ca patthanaṃ katvā imaṃ dasavidhaṃ dānavatthuṃ
atk-s0303a:489_17: datvā taṃ sampattiṃ anubhavituṃ tattha nibbattanti.
atk-s0303a:494_1: Supaṇṇasaṃyutte pattānaṃ vaṇṇavantatāya garuḷā supaṇṇāti vuttā.
atk-s0303a:494_4: Uddharamānā ca pana te attanā hīne vā same vā uddharituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0303a:494_6: Sattavidhā hi anuddharaṇīyanāgā nāma paṇītatarā kambalassatarā dhataraṭṭhā sattasīdantaravāsino pathaviṭṭhakā pabbataṭṭhakā vimānaṭṭhakāti.
atk-s0303a:494_10: te yattha katthaci disvā yo koci supaṇṇo uddharituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a:494_14: te yasmā katthaci vikampanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a:494_19: te yo koci samo vā paṇītataro vā supaṇṇo uddharituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0303a:499_1: Gandhabbakāyasaṃyutte mūlagandhe adhivatthāti yassa rukkhassa mūle gandho atthi,
atk-s0303a:499_3: So hi sakalopi rukkho tesaṃ upakappati.
atk-s0303a:499_6: Yassa hi rukkhassa sabbesampi mūlādīnaṃ gandho atthi,
atk-s0303a:499_11: So dātā hoti mūlagandhānanti so kāḷānusārikādīnaṃ mūlagandhānaṃ dātā hoti.
atk-s0303a:499_15: Taṃ dassetuṃ so annaṃ detītiādi dasavidhaṃ dānavatthu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a:504_1: Valāhakasaṃyutte valāhakakāyikāti valāhakanāmake devakāye uppannā ākāsacārikadevā.
atk-s0303a:504_5: Sītaṃ hotīti yaṃ vassāne vā hemante vā sītaṃ hoti,
atk-s0303a:504_16: Idhāpi yaṃ vassāne ca sisire ca abbhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0303a:504_22: Vāto hotīti yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ utumhi uttaradakkhiṇādipakativāto hoti,
atk-s0303a:504_24: Yopi pana rukkhakkhandhādipadālano ativāto nāma atthi, ayañceva,
atk-s0303a:504_27: Devo vassatīti yaṃ vassike cattāro māse vassaṃ,
atk-s0303a:505_1: eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto talakūṭakavāsi khīṇāsavattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0303a:505_13: “Sādhu devaputtā”ti so pāde dhovitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0303a:505_14: Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipi.
atk-s0303a:505_17: Apica devo nāmesa aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi vassati nāgānubhāvena supaṇṇānubhāvena devatānubhāvena saccakiriyāya
atk-s0303a:510_4: Imasmiñca pana saṃyutte ekādasa suttāni pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0303a:516_1: Jhānasaṃyuttassa paṭhame samādhikusaloti paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ dutiyaṃ tivaṅgikanti evaṃ aṅgavavatthānakusalo.
atk-s0303a:516_2: Na samādhismiṃ samāpattikusaloti cittaṃ hāsetvā kallaṃ katvā jhānaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a:518_1: Dutiyādīsu na samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusaloti jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ akusalo,
atk-s0303a:518_3: Na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusaloti jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ akusalo,
atk-s0303a:518_5: Na samādhismiṃ kallitakusaloti cittaṃ hāsetvā kallaṃ kātuṃ akusalo.
atk-s0303a:518_7: Na samādhismiṃ gocarakusaloti kammaṭṭhānagocare ceva bhikkhācāragocare ca akusalo.
atk-s0303a:518_8: Na samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusaloti kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhinīharituṃ akusalo.
atk-s0303a:518_9: Na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārīti jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkaccakārī na hoti.
atk-s0303a:518_10: Na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārīti jhānappanāya satatakārī na hoti,
atk-s0303a:518_12: Na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārīti samādhissa sappāye upakārakadhamme pūretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a:518_13: Tato paraṃ samāpattiādīhi padehi yojetvā catukkā vuttā.
